prompt:
Nurse: Just give me a second to work out the best way I can assist you. Of course, Mr. Peck. I apologize for any confusion earlier. You were saying you're going to see the play Camelot. That's wonderful! Are you a fan of theater and have you seen this play before?

Patient: I am a fan of the theater, and no I haven't.

Nurse: That's wonderful, Mr. Peck! It's always exciting to experience a new play. Do you usually go to the theater alone or do you have someone to accompany you?

Patient: I go with the group.

Nurse: I'm sorry, Mr. Peck, could you please repeat that?

Patient: I said I go with a group.

Nurse: That sounds like a great way to enjoy the theater, Mr. Peck. Is it a social group or a group of friends who share the same interest in theater?

Patient: Yes. It's my senior group.

responses.gpt4: That's wonderful, Mr. Peck. It's nice to have people who share the same interests. Do you have any health concerns or anything you'd like to bring up as part of this check-in?
responses.our_model: That's wonderful, Mr. Peck. It's great to have a group of friends with similar interests. Before we move on, is there anything you've been feeling concerned about regarding your health, especially related to your kidney disease?
